sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-app-bar color="success" dark app>
      <v-toolbar-title><v-btn text to="/">WORKOUT APP</v-btn></v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-toolbar-items>
        <v-btn text to="/">HOME</v-btn>
      </v-toolbar-items>
    </v-app-bar>
    <v-main>
      <router-view />
    </v-main>
    <v-footer color="success" dark app class="justify-center">
      developed by Yoshiki
    </v-footer>
  </v-app>
</template>
<script>
import { apiService } from "../common/api.service.js";

export default {
  name: "App",
  props: {
    id: {
      type: Number,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      workout: {},
      body_items: ["CHEST", "BACK", "SHOULDER", "LEG"],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    setPageTitle(title) {
      document.title = title;
    },
    getWorkoutData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/workouts/${this.id}/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then((data) => {
        this.workout = data;
        this.setPageTitle(data.workout);
      });
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.getWorkoutData();
    console.log(this.workout);
  },
};
</script>

<style></style>
